author: SnooMuffins8070
body: 100% agree. AI is definitely overhyped. As someone who works in the industry, other than a handful of companies doing cutting edge AI research e.g. Google, Microsoft, etc., a lot of companies saying that they use AI are just building predictive models.

author: Daddylongsnek
body: I mean FB MSFT and AAPL already beat earnings last week, yet the Nasdaq still crashed. I think GOOG and AMZN will do pretty well too

author: Strill
body: It was undervalued because they still make decent money each year, they got a new CEO from a super-successful online store, they are planning on focusing on their online store instead of their brick & mortar stores, and because they got a new deal with Microsoft.  They're getting all the things they need to turn their business around.

body:
